description: 2017-07-24, Venice — This was a good day for my photography. Great light. Think this was taken from the Rialto Bridge.
2017-07-24, Venice — I think this was my first shot of a random person in public ever, and it turned out well. I was so pleased.
2021-08-19, Peak District — Taken from Jacob's Ladder on the Pennine Way in the morning light. Don't walk across Kinder Scout, it's all peat.
2023-04-02, Birmingham — Soft colours walking down Broad Street with Ilong and Tom.
2023-05-20, Birmingham — My mate Matt's band Charm at Sunflower Lounge the first time I saw them.
2023-05-29, Birmingham — On the way back from a fruitless but lovely photo walk with Lucas. You can never quite predict when you'll get a nice image.
